answer: The fee structure for the BBA program is ₹1,20,000 – ₹1,80,000 per year, while the fee for the PhD Management program is ₹1,00,000 – ₹1,50,000 per year. Please note that hostel fees are separate and range from ₹1,20,000 – ₹1,50,000 per year. The undergraduate programs, including BBA, have a fee range of ₹2,10,000 – ₹3,90,000 per year, postgraduate programs range from ₹1,80,000 – ₹3,20,000 per year, and doctoral programs range from ₹1,00,000 – ₹1,50,000 per year. These fees include tuition, labs, library, and student activities.
